Class Controller

Controls a view model (and optionally its view), according to a particular behavior and by following a set of instructions.

Hierarchy

  • Controller

Index

  • constructor

Constructors

constructor

  • new Controller(behavior: HtmlBehaviorResource, instruction: BehaviorInstruction, viewModel: Object, container: Container): Controller
    • Defined in node_modules/aurelia-templating/dist/aurelia-templating.d.ts:1573

    Creates an instance of Controller.

    Parameters

    • behavior: HtmlBehaviorResource

      The HtmlBehaviorResource that provides the base behavior for this controller.

    • instruction: BehaviorInstruction

      The instructions pertaining to the controller's behavior.

    • viewModel: Object

      The developer's view model instance which provides the custom behavior for this controller.

    • container: Container

      The container that the controller's view was created from.

    Returns Controller

Properties

behavior

behavior: HtmlBehaviorResource
  • Defined in node_modules/aurelia-templating/dist/aurelia-templating.d.ts:1562

The HtmlBehaviorResource that provides the base behavior for this controller.

view

view: View
  • Defined in node_modules/aurelia-templating/dist/aurelia-templating.d.ts:1573

The view associated with the component being controlled by this controller. Note: Not all components will have a view, so the value may be null.

viewModel

viewModel: Object
  • Defined in node_modules/aurelia-templating/dist/aurelia-templating.d.ts:1567

The developer's view model instance which provides the custom behavior for this controller.

attached

  • attached(): void

    Attaches the controller.

    Returns void

automate

  • automate(overrideContext?: Object, owningView?: View): void
    • Defined in node_modules/aurelia-templating/dist/aurelia-templating.d.ts:1596

    Used to automate the proper binding of this controller and its view. Used by the composition engine for dynamic component creation. This should be considered a semi-private API and is subject to change without notice, even across minor or patch releases.

    Parameters

    • Optional overrideContext: Object

      An override context for binding.

    • Optional owningView: View

      The view inside which this controller resides.

    Returns void

    • Defined in node_modules/aurelia-templating/dist/aurelia-templating.d.ts:1602

    Binds the controller to the scope.

    Parameters

      The binding scope.

    Returns void
